title: Lending and Borrowing Protocols
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Lending and Borrowing Protocols.

hook.text: Aave and Compound let you lend crypto and earn interest â€” or borrow it using your crypto as collateral.

buildup.text: Depositors earn interest from borrowers. Rates adjust automatically based on supply and demand.

discovery.text: Borrowing requires over-collateralization. To borrow $100, you might need to lock up $150 in crypto.

twist.text: If your collateral drops in value, the protocol sells it automatically. No warnings, no second chances.

climax.text: These protocols manage billions without a single loan officer. Math and code replaced the entire credit department.

punchline.text: A loan from nobody, approved by math, enforced by code.

quiz.question: What happens if your collateral drops in a DeFi lending protocol?
options: The protocol automatically liquidates your collateral
